mapper.insert: INSERT INTO farmlog SET member_id = #{member_id}, crop_variety_id = #{crop_variety_id}, work_type_id = #{work_type_id}, agrochemical_id = #{agrochemical_id}, work_date = #{work_date}, work_memo = #{work_memo}
